articles.title: DR Congo coup attempt: Three Americans have death sentence overturned - BBC
articles.description: The Americans are among 37 people sentenced to death last September by  a military court.
articles.content:
Three Americans convicted for their role in a failed coup in Democratic Republic of Congo last year have had their death sentences commuted to life imprisonment, the presidency has said.

articles.title: Stephanie Vaquer relinquishes North American title; ladder match to determine new champion - Cageside Seats
